# Privacy Policy

Last updated: May 2022

## Information that is gathered from visitors

In common with other websites, log files are stored on the web server saving
details such as the visitor's IP address, browser type, referring page and
time of visit.

Where registration is required, the visitor's email and a username will be
stored on the server.
sharing: E-mail addresses will not be sold, rented or leased to 3rd parties.
